overview:
David is a graduate from the Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology (KNUST) with a degree in Mathematics (BSc.).

He has developed software concepts for companies and works in 8 programming languages. He likes data crunching stuff and is also passionate about technology growth in Africa and has served in an advisory team for #MobileFriday (a mobile developer group on KNUST campus).

David is also a board member of one of the mining companies in Ghana.
